Name: Dr. C.N. Ashwath Narayan
Tweet: Another feather in the cap of CM Siddaramaiah!  Would the CM care to explain as to why he protected and promoted the fraud Ponzi schemes operated by the companies who were declared as National Security threat?   ಇದೇನಾ ನೀವು ನುಡಿದಂತೆ ನಡೆದದ್ದು ಸಿದ್ದರಾಮಯ್ಯನವರೇ?  #SiddaExposed
